content.raw:
I just checked the log-file from the X4-Robot in the "nkoenig/subt-virtual-testbed" docker container \("`~/.ros/log/latest$ less X4_1-robot_localization_ukf_node_odom-1-stdout.log`"\). The docker container was started with an X4-Robot : "`./run.bash nkoenig/subt-virtual-testbed tunnel_circuit_practice.ign robotName1:=X4_1 robotConfig1:=X4_SENSOR_CONFIG_4`". 

There the messages also occur. The "`transform_timeout`" occurs about every 2 to 4 seconds. The "`Failed to meet update rate.`"-Error occurs up to 10 time per second. 

I haven't checked how the robot\_localization node is configured there, but doesn’t the errors occur a bit too often?
content.html:
I just checked the log-file from the X4-Robot in the "nkoenig/subt-virtual-testbed" docker container ("~/.ros/log/latest$ less X4_1-robot_localization_ukf_node_odom-1-stdout.log"). The docker container was started with an X4-Robot : "./run.bash nkoenig/subt-virtual-testbed tunnel_circuit_practice.ign robotName1:=X4_1 robotConfig1:=X4_SENSOR_CONFIG_4".

There the messages also occur. The "transform_timeout" occurs about every 2 to 4 seconds. The "Failed to meet update rate."-Error occurs up to 10 time per second.

I haven't checked how the robot_localization node is configured there, but doesn’t the errors occur a bit too often?
